0.text: Dear Rajan, There is a creative work competition. Would you like to take part? Venura
0.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Dear <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='raːd͡ʒan'>Rajan</phoneme>, There is a creative work competition. Would you like to take part? <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='venura'>Venura</phoneme></prosody></speak>

1.text: Imagine that you are Rajan and write a reply to this note. You may use the following:
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Imagine that you are <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='raːd͡ʒan'>Rajan</phoneme> and write a reply to this note. You may use the following:</prosody></speak>

2.text: That's great / I would like to take part / we can work together/ I will not miss this opportunity etc.
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>That's great / I would like to take part / we can work together/ I will not miss this opportunity etc.</prosody></speak>

4.text: Rajan planned to deliver a speech at the school assembly. This is how he did it using a mind map.
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='raːd͡ʒan'>Rajan</phoneme> planned to deliver a speech at the school assembly. This is how he did it using a mind map.</prosody></speak>

17.text: Complete the mind map and write a speech on "My School".
17.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Complete the mind map and write a speech on "My School".</prosody></speak>
